channel.title: Changing the Color of Money
channel.description: Okay so I want to change the color of stacked money (995) to let's say green. I know barely anything about client coding, so I could use some help.

item.title: Changing the Color of Money
item.dc:creator: @bobbykinney000 bobbykinney000
item.description:
@bobbykinney000 wrote:

i think this should work

go into class 8 in your client

paste this code in there

if(i == 995){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “pickup”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = color id that equals green goes here;
class8.anInt174 = 14050;//item look
class8.anInt181 = 1957;
class8.anInt190 = 498;
class8.anInt198 = 484;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -1;
class8.anInt194 = -1;
class8.anInt165 = 14051;
class8.anInt200 = 14051;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = "coins ";
class8.aByteArray178 = “lovely money.”.getBytes();
}

not exactly sure on this you might wana back up before you try this.
